etymologies: late 17th century: variant of chagrin in the literal sense ‘rough skin’

definitions: sharkskin used as a decorative material or, for its natural rough surface of pointed scales, as an abrasive.
shortDefinitions: sharkskin used as decorative material or, due to its natural rough surface of pointed scales

definitions: a kind of untanned leather with a rough granulated surface.
shortDefinitions: kind of untanned leather with rough granulated surface
